SS2_NEMBANDIT_DESCRIPTION:
The Nemesis Bandit doesn't care for pleas, for he brings misery in those who dare step in his way.

<color=#CCD3E0>< ! > idk lol
SS2_NEMBANDIT_OUTRO: ..and so he left, with absolutely no regrets.
SS2_NEMBANDIT_FAILURE: ..and so he vanished, a plea bargain for his crimes.
SS2_NEMBANDIT_PRIMARY_DESC: Shoot for (mid)%. Holds enough shots to kill anything that moves.
SS2_NEMBANDIT_SECONDARY_DESC: Toss a bundle of dynamite for damage. TO-DO: Copy Moffein description.
SS2_NEMBANDIT_SECONDARY_COIN_DESC: Toss a coin in the air, and shoot it to direct it into the nearest enemy for (high)%. Works like you expect it to.
SS2_NEMBANDIT_UTILITY_DESC: Throw a lasso at an enemy, stunning if it connects. Recast to pull the enemy in.
SS2_NEMBANDIT_SPECIAL_DESC: Shoot your shotgun for (insane)%. Kills reset cooldowns.
